resources.string:
Hey, my name is Covid. 

I am a virus. 

I have ability to spread when people cough, sneeze, sing etc. 
The closer people interact, and the longer they interact, the more likely they are to transmit me. 

Masks and gloves disturbs my journey. 
And sanitizer kills me. 
As the people become more careless I can move faster and gain immunity. 

I heard that the vaccination for me has come to action. 

So I think it's time for me to go to mars. 
But I'm sure you all have seen a world you never saw before, Thank me later!.
